columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The kind of the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The status of the cognitive services account at the time the operation was called. Possible values include: 'Accepted', 'Creating', 'Deleting', 'Moving', 'Failed', 'Succeeded', 'ResolvingDNS'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource. E.g. 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines' or 'Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts'.

columns.name: custom_sub_domain_name
columns.description: The subdomain name used for token-based authentication.

columns.name: date_created
columns.description: The date of cognitive services account creation.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: Checks if local auth is disabled for the resource.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The endpoint of the created account.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The resource etag.

columns.name: is_migrated
columns.description: Checks if the resource is migrated from an existing key.

columns.name: migration_token
columns.description: The resource migration token.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Whether or not public endpoint access is allowed for this account. Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: restore
columns.description: Checks if restore is enabled for the resource.

columns.name: restrict_outbound_network_access
columns.description: Checks if outbound network access is restricted for the resource.

columns.name: allowed_fqdn_list
columns.description: The allowed FQDN list for the resource.

columns.name: api_properties
columns.description: The api properties for special APIs.

columns.name: call_rate_limit
columns.description: The call rate limit of the resource.

columns.name: capabilities
columns.description: The capabilities of the cognitive services account. Each item indicates the capability of a specific feature. The values are read-only and for reference only.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the cognitive service account.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: The encryption properties for the resource.

columns.name: endpoints
columns.description: All endpoints of the cognitive services account.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity for the resource.

columns.name: network_acls
columns.description: A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The private endpoint connection associated with the cognitive services account.

columns.name: quota_limit
columns.description: The quota limit of the resource.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The resource model definition representing SKU.

columns.name: sku_change_info
columns.description: Sku change info of the resource.

columns.name: system_data
columns.description: The metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

columns.name: user_owned_storage
columns.description: The storage accounts for the resource.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
